directions: Fill 4 (8 to 10-ounce) highball glasses with ice cubes. Divide the lemon and cucumber slices among the glasses.
In a large pitcher, pour in the seltzer, lemonade and Pimm's. Stir to combine. Pour mixture into prepared glasses and enjoy!
ingredients: 3 cups Pimm's No. 1 Cup, available at liquor stores
title: Pimm's Cup Cocktail
